Uses of Package
net.markenwerk.utils.text.fetcher

  • Packages that use net.markenwerk.utils.text.fetcher 
    Package Description
    net.markenwerk.utils.text.fetcher  
  • Classes in net.markenwerk.utils.text.fetcher used by net.markenwerk.utils.text.fetcher 
    Class and Description
    AbstractBufferedTextFetcher
    AbstractBufferedTextFetcher is a sensible base implementation of TextFetcher that uses a char[] as buffer, to while copying all chars from an Reader to an Writer by sequentially reading from the Reader into the buffer and then writing from the buffer to the Writer.
    AbstractTextFetcher
    AbstractTextFetcher is a sensible base implementation of TextFetcher.
    TextFetcher
    A TextFetcher can fetch the entire content of a given Readable into a fresh char[] or String or copy it into a given Appendable.
    TextFetchException
    A TextFetchException is a specialized IOException that indicates that a fetch operation of a TextFetcher has failed.
    TextFetchProgressListener
